to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: ubuntu live CD and software speech
body:
Hi, Does ubuntu any of it's versions mainly interested in a live CD that 
supports software speech and what would I type at the boot prompt to get it 
up and running?  I have been using oralux but that is rather old and out 
dated now and I am looking for something more updated. 


_______________________________________________

Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
http://speech.braille.uwo.ca/mailman/listinfo/speakup
